StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc1045
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FirstName varchar(20) = null, @LastName varchar(20) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null, @ProspectDisposi.onId int = NULL, @PACCreatedFromDate DateTime = null, @PACCreatedToDate DateTime = null, @Ac.vityFromDate DateTime = null, @Ac.vityToDate DateTime = null , @Gradua.onYear int = null, @SchoolIDs xml = null, @ZipCodes xml = NULL, @SubSta.onType varchar(1) = NULL )
AS
SET ARITHABORT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
IF (@SchoolIDS IS NOT NULL OR @ZipCodes IS NOT NULL) BEGIN
CREATE TABLE #ZipCodesTable ( ID VARCHAR(5) )
CREATE TABLE #PROSPECT_ADDRESS ( PersonId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,PersonAddressTypeId INT )
CREATE TABLE #PROSPECT_SCHOOL ( prospec.d UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,schoolid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER )
IF @ZipCodes IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #ZipCodesTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(5)') FROM @ZipCodes.nodes('ZipCodes/id') as ParamValues(ID)
INSERT INTO #PROSPECT_ADDRESS SELECT pa.PersonId ,pa.PersonAddressTypeId FROM #ZipCodesTable zct INNER JOIN [USMC].[PersonAddress] pa ON zct.ID = LEFT(pa.ZipCode,5) WHERE pa.PersonAddressTypeId = 1
INSERT INTO #PROSPECT_SCHOOL SELECT ps.prospec.d ,ps.schoolid FROM #ZipCodesTable zct INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON zct.ID = LEFT(HS.ZIP_CODE, 5) INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON ps.SchoolId = hs.rowguid END
SELECT * INTO #Prospect From ( SELECT ie.ImportEventId, p.PersonId, p.FirstName, p.MiddleName, p.LastName, pr.ProspectId, pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, pr.Recrui.ngPersonId, pr.Gradua.onYear, pr.ProspectDisposi.onId, pr.PACCreateDate, pr.Ac.vity, pr.Ac.vityDate, pr.CareerDecision, pr.Ini.alContactType, pr.ASVABDate, pr.Source, pr.NoChildLe.BehindOptIn, pr.Suppression, pr.ContactTimeIndicator, pr.Note, pr.LastUpdateDate, pr.LastUpdateUserId, pr.CreatedDate, pr.SubSta.onType, pr.NwaId, pr.AcpApplicantId, pr.TDQRemark, pr.PriorityCode, pr.SourceDual, pr.PPC, pr.ReferralSSN, pr.CategoryCode, pr.Interest, pr.ProgramType, pr.ProgramCode, pr.ReferOSODate, pr.Ini.alContactDate, pr.MonthWorkFor, pr.BirthDocumentCode, pr.DriverLicenseNumber, pr.DriverLicenseState, pr.DriverLicenseExp, pr.HasDriversLicense, pr.HasDrugUse, pr.HasMoralO.ense, pr.HasPhysicalProblems, pr.WaverInfo, pr.Expira.onDate, pr.RecruiterComments, pr.SncoicComments, pr.AvablTime, pr.AvablLoca.on, pr.AvablOtherDesc, pr.StsChgDepcy, pr.StsChgEdu, pr.StsChgPhys, pr.StsChgDrug, pr.StsChgMoral, pr.StsChgAtrRisk, pr.StsChgOther, pr.StsChgOtherDesc, pr.StsChgRemark, pr.DigitalCommunica.on
FROM [usmc].[ImportEvent] ie INNER JOIN [usmc].[ImportPerson] ip on ie.importeven.d = ip.importeven.d INNER JOIN [usmc].[Person] p on ip.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN usmc.Prospect pr ON p.PersonId = pr.PersonId INNER JOIN #Prospect_School ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) WHERE IE.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 AND pr.SubSta.onType = @SubSta.onType
Union
SELECT ie.ImportEventId, p.PersonId, p.FirstName, p.MiddleName, p.LastName, pr.ProspectId, pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, pr.Recrui.ngPersonId, pr.Gradua.onYear, pr.ProspectDisposi.onId, pr.PACCreateDate, pr.Ac.vity, pr.Ac.vityDate, pr.CareerDecision, pr.Ini.alContactType, pr.ASVABDate, pr.Source, pr.NoChildLe.BehindOptIn, pr.Suppression, pr.ContactTimeIndicator, pr.Note, pr.LastUpdateDate, pr.LastUpdateUserId, pr.CreatedDate, pr.SubSta.onType, pr.NwaId, pr.AcpApplicantId, pr.TDQRemark, pr.PriorityCode, pr.SourceDual, pr.PPC, pr.ReferralSSN, pr.CategoryCode, pr.Interest, pr.ProgramType, pr.ProgramCode, pr.ReferOSODate, pr.Ini.alContactDate, pr.MonthWorkFor, pr.BirthDocumentCode, pr.DriverLicenseNumber, pr.DriverLicenseState, pr.DriverLicenseExp, pr.HasDriversLicense, pr.HasDrugUse, pr.HasMoralO.ense, pr.HasPhysicalProblems, pr.WaverInfo, pr.Expira.onDate, pr.RecruiterComments, pr.SncoicComments, pr.AvablTime, pr.AvablLoca.on, pr.AvablOtherDesc, pr.StsChgDepcy, pr.StsChgEdu, pr.StsChgPhys, pr.StsChgDrug, pr.StsChgMoral, pr.StsChgAtrRisk, pr.StsChgOther, pr.StsChgOtherDesc, pr.StsChgRemark, pr.DigitalCommunica.on
FROM [usmc].[ImportEvent] ie INNER JOIN [usmc].[ImportPerson] ip on ie.importeven.d = ip.importeven.d INNER JOIN [usmc].[Person] p on ip.PersonId = p.PersonId INNER JOIN usmc.Prospect pr ON p.PersonId = pr.PersonId INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_ADDRESS pa on (pr.PersonId = pa.PersonId) WHERE IE.ImportEventStatusTypeId = 3 AND pr.SubSta.onType = @SubSta.onType ) as T
CREATE TABLE #SchoolsTable ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER )
IF @SchoolIDs IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #SchoolsTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(36)') FROM @SchoolIds.nodes('/Schools/id') as ParamValues(ID)
INSERT INTO #PROSPECT_SCHOOL SELECT ps.prospec.d ,ps.Schoolid FROM #SchoolsTable st INNER JOIN USMC.ProspectSchool ps ON st.ID = ps.SchoolId
END
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_EVENT( [ProspectId] [uniqueiden..er] NOT NULL, [PersonId] [uniqueiden..er] NOT NULL, [Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] [uniqueiden..er] NOT NULL, [Recrui.ngPersonId] [uniqueiden..er] NULL, [SchoolId] [uniqueiden..er] NULL, [Gradua.onYear] [smallint] NULL, [ProspectDisposi.onId] [smallint] NULL, [PACCreateDate] [date.me] NULL, [Ac.vity] [varchar](10) NULL, [Ac.vityDate] [date.me] NULL, [CareerDecision] [varchar](50) NULL, [Ini.alContactType] [varchar](10) NULL, [ASVABDate] [date.me] NULL, [Source] [varchar](10) NULL, [NoChildLe.BehindOptIn] [bit] NULL, [Suppression] [bit] NULL, [ContactTimeIndicator] [char](1) NULL, [Note] [varchar](500) NULL, [LastUpdateDate] [date.me] NOT NULL, [LastUpdateUserId] [uniqueiden..er] NOT NULL, [CreatedDate] [date.me] NOT NULL, [SubSta.onType] [char](1) NULL, [RANK_CODE] [varchar](10) NULL, [RecruiterLastName] [varchar](20) NULL, [RecruiterFirstName] [varchar](20) NULL, [RecruiterMiddleName] [varchar](20) NULL, [NwaId] [uniqueiden..er] NULL, [AcpApplicantId] [uniqueiden..er] NULL, [TDQRemark] [varchar](50) NULL, [PriorityCode] [int] NULL, [SourceDual] [varchar](10) NULL, [PPC] [varchar](8) NULL, [ReferralSSN] [varchar](9) NULL, [CategoryCode] [varchar](6) NULL, [Interest] [varchar](500) NULL, [ProgramType] [varchar](4) NULL, [ProgramCode] [varchar](4) NULL, [ReferOSODate] [date.me] NULL, [Ini.alContactDate] [date.me] NULL, [MonthWorkFor] [date.me] NULL, [BirthDocumentCode] [int] NULL, [DriverLicenseNumber] [varchar](20) NULL, [DriverLicenseState] [varchar](2) NULL, [DriverLicenseExp] [date.me] NULL, [HasDriversLicense] [bit] NULL, [HasDrugUse] [bit] NULL, [HasMoralO.ense] [bit] NULL, [HasPhysicalProblems] [bit] NULL, [WaverInfo] [varchar](500) NULL, [Expira.onDate] [date.me] NULL, [RecruiterComments] [varchar](500) NULL, [SncoicComments] [varchar](500) NULL, [AvablTime] [int] NULL, [AvablLoca.on] [int] NULL, [AvablOtherDesc] [varchar](50) NULL, [StsChgDepcy] [bit] NULL, [StsChgEdu] [bit] NULL, [StsChgPhys] [bit] NULL, [StsChgDrug] [bit] NULL, [StsChgMoral] [bit] NULL, [StsChgAtrRisk] [bit] NULL, [StsChgOther] [bit] NULL, [StsChgOtherDesc] [varchar](20) NULL, [StsChgRemark] [varchar](500) NULL, [DigitalCommunica.on] [varchar](1000) NULL )
IF (@SchoolIDS IS NOT null AND @ZipCodes IS null) BEGIN
INSERT INTO #TEMP_EVENT SELECT DISTINCT PR.ProspectId, PR.PersonId, PR.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, PR.Recrui.ngPersonId, ps.SchoolId, PR.Gradua.onYear, PR.ProspectDisposi.onId, PR.PACCreateDate, PR.Ac.vity, PR.Ac.vityDate, PR.CareerDecision, PR.Ini.alContactType, PR.ASVABDate, PR.Source, PR.NoChildLe.BehindOptIn, PR.Suppression, PR.ContactTimeIndicator, PR.Note, PR.LastUpdateDate, PR.LastUpdateUserId, PR.CreatedDate, PR.SubSta.onType, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PR.NwaId, PR.AcpApplicantId, PR.TDQRemark, PR.PriorityCode, PR.SourceDual, PR.PPC, PR.ReferralSSN, PR.CategoryCode, PR.Interest, PR.ProgramType, PR.ProgramCode, PR.ReferOSODate, PR.Ini.alContactDate, PR.MonthWorkFor, PR.BirthDocumentCode, PR.DriverLicenseNumber, PR.DriverLicenseState, PR.DriverLicenseExp, PR.HasDriversLicense, PR.HasDrugUse, PR.HasMoralO.ense, PR.HasPhysicalProblems, PR.WaverInfo, PR.Expira.onDate, PR.RecruiterComments, PR.SncoicComments, PR.AvablTime, PR.AvablLoca.on, PR.AvablOtherDesc, PR.StsChgDepcy, PR.StsChgEdu, PR.StsChgPhys, PR.StsChgDrug, PR.StsChgMoral, PR.StsChgAtrRisk, PR.StsChgOther, PR.StsChgOtherDesc, PR.StsChgRemark, PR.DigitalCommunica.on FROM #Prospect pr INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectDisposi.on] pdt on (pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP on (Pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid)--RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorRecruiter] MSR on (pr.Recrui.ngPersonId=MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] MS on(MSR.SectorId=MS.SectorID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO on (Pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = RO.rowguid)--ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_SCHOOL ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) WHERE (@ProspectDisposi.onId is null OR pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId = @ProspectDisposi.onId) --AND --(@PACCreatedFromDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate >= @PACCreatedFromDate) --AND --(@PACCreatedToDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate <= @PACCreatedToDate) --AND --(@Gradua.onYear is null OR pr.Gradua.onYear=@Gradua.onYear) ----Recruiter Ac.vity --AND --(@Ac.vityFromDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate >= @Ac.vityFromDate) --AND --(@Ac.vityToDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate <= @Ac.vityToDate)
END
IF (@ZipCodes IS NOT null AND @SchoolIDs IS null) BEGIN
INSERT INTO #TEMP_EVENT SELECT DISTINCT PR.ProspectId, PR.PersonId, PR.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, PR.Recrui.ngPersonId, ps.SchoolId, PR.Gradua.onYear, PR.ProspectDisposi.onId, PR.PACCreateDate, PR.Ac.vity, PR.Ac.vityDate, PR.CareerDecision, PR.Ini.alContactType, PR.ASVABDate, PR.Source, PR.NoChildLe.BehindOptIn, PR.Suppression, PR.ContactTimeIndicator, PR.Note, PR.LastUpdateDate, PR.LastUpdateUserId, PR.CreatedDate, PR.SubSta.onType, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PR.NwaId, PR.AcpApplicantId, PR.TDQRemark, PR.PriorityCode, PR.SourceDual, PR.PPC, PR.ReferralSSN, PR.CategoryCode, PR.Interest, PR.ProgramType, PR.ProgramCode, PR.ReferOSODate, PR.Ini.alContactDate, PR.MonthWorkFor, PR.BirthDocumentCode, PR.DriverLicenseNumber, PR.DriverLicenseState, PR.DriverLicenseExp, PR.HasDriversLicense, PR.HasDrugUse, PR.HasMoralO.ense, PR.HasPhysicalProblems, PR.WaverInfo, PR.Expira.onDate, PR.RecruiterComments, PR.SncoicComments, PR.AvablTime, PR.AvablLoca.on, PR.AvablOtherDesc, PR.StsChgDepcy, PR.StsChgEdu, PR.StsChgPhys, PR.StsChgDrug, PR.StsChgMoral, PR.StsChgAtrRisk, PR.StsChgOther, PR.StsChgOtherDesc, PR.StsChgRemark, PR.DigitalCommunica.on FROM #Prospect pr INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectDisposi.on] pdt on (pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP on (Pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid)--RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorRecruiter] MSR on (pr.Recrui.ngPersonId=MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] MS on(MSR.SectorId=MS.SectorID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO on (Pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = RO.rowguid)--ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_SCHOOL ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) WHERE (@ProspectDisposi.onId is null OR pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId = @ProspectDisposi.onId) --AND --(@PACCreatedFromDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate >= @PACCreatedFromDate) --AND --(@PACCreatedToDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate <= @PACCreatedToDate) --AND --(@Gradua.onYear is null OR pr.Gradua.onYear=@Gradua.onYear) ----Recruiter Ac.vity --AND --(@Ac.vityFromDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate >= @Ac.vityFromDate) --AND --(@Ac.vityToDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate <= @Ac.vityToDate)
INSERT INTO #TEMP_EVENT SELECT DISTINCT PR.ProspectId, PR.PersonId, PR.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId, PR.Recrui.ngPersonId, ps.SchoolId, PR.Gradua.onYear, PR.ProspectDisposi.onId, PR.PACCreateDate, PR.Ac.vity, PR.Ac.vityDate, PR.CareerDecision, PR.Ini.alContactType, PR.ASVABDate, PR.Source, PR.NoChildLe.BehindOptIn, PR.Suppression, PR.ContactTimeIndicator, PR.Note, PR.LastUpdateDate, PR.LastUpdateUserId, PR.CreatedDate, PR.SubSta.onType, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PR.NwaId, PR.AcpApplicantId, PR.TDQRemark, PR.PriorityCode, PR.SourceDual, PR.PPC, PR.ReferralSSN, PR.CategoryCode, PR.Interest, PR.ProgramType, PR.ProgramCode, PR.ReferOSODate, PR.Ini.alContactDate, PR.MonthWorkFor, PR.BirthDocumentCode, PR.DriverLicenseNumber, PR.DriverLicenseState, PR.DriverLicenseExp, PR.HasDriversLicense, PR.HasDrugUse, PR.HasMoralO.ense, PR.HasPhysicalProblems, PR.WaverInfo, PR.Expira.onDate, PR.RecruiterComments, PR.SncoicComments, PR.AvablTime, PR.AvablLoca.on, PR.AvablOtherDesc, PR.StsChgDepcy, PR.StsChgEdu, PR.StsChgPhys, PR.StsChgDrug, PR.StsChgMoral, PR.StsChgAtrRisk, PR.StsChgOther, PR.StsChgOtherDesc, PR.StsChgRemark, PR.DigitalCommunica.on FROM #Prospect pr INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectDisposi.on] pdt on (pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP on (Pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid)--RECRUITING_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSectorRecruiter] MSR on (pr.Recrui.ngPersonId=MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId) INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MapsSector] MS on(MSR.SectorId=MS.SectorID) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO on (Pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = RO.rowguid)--ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_ADDRESS PA_PRIMARY ON PA_PRIMARY.PersonId = pr.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectSchool] ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) WHERE (@ProspectDisposi.onId is null OR pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId = @ProspectDisposi.onId) --AND --(@PACCreatedFromDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate >= @PACCreatedFromDate) --AND --(@PACCreatedToDate is null OR pr.PACCreateDate <= @PACCreatedToDate) --AND --(@Gradua.onYear is null OR pr.Gradua.onYear=@Gradua.onYear) ----Recruiter Ac.vity --AND --(@Ac.vityFromDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate >= @Ac.vityFromDate) --AND --(@Ac.vityToDate is null OR pr.Ac.vityDate <= @Ac.vityToDate) END
SELECT * FROM #TEMP_EVENT
DROP TABLE #Prospect DROP TABLE #TEMP_EVENT DROP TABLE #SchoolsTable DROP TABLE #ZipCodesTable DROP TABLE #PROSPECT_SCHOOL DROP TABLE #PROSPECT_ADDRESS
END
